database.name: VIEW SSVE_BUDGET_DETAILS_V
database.view: SELECT b.updatedby, b.updated, b.createdby, b.created, b.isactive, b.ad_client_id, get_uuid() AS ssve_budget_details_v_id, b.ad_org_id, b.c_year_id, b.type_of_budget, bv.date_from, b.c_currency_id, bl.line, bl.sfb_budget_area_id, bl.c_costcenter_id, bl.sfb_budget_item_id, bl.user1_id, bl.budgeted_value, bl.adjusted_value, bl.committed_value, bl.available_balance, bl.executed_value, bl.actual_value, bcl.certified_value AS certified_value_cert, bcl.committed_value AS committed_value_cert, bcl.available_balance AS available_balance_cert, bcl.executed_value AS executed_value_cert, bcl.actual_value AS actual_value_cert, bcld.c_order_id, bcld.c_orderline_id, bcld.c_bpartner_ord_id, bcld.totalamt_ord, bcld.c_invoice_id, bcld.c_invoiceline_id, bcld.c_bpartner_inv_id, bcld.totalamt_inv, bjld.gl_journal_id, bjld.gl_journalline_id, bjld.totalamt AS totalamt_jour, bpd.fin_payment_id, bpd.c_bpartner_id AS c_bpartner_id_pay, bpd.amount AS amount_pay, vd.ssve_viatical_id, vd.ssve_viatical_settlement_id, vd.c_bpartner_id AS c_bpartner_id_via, vd.totalamt_viatical, vd.totalamt_sett, COALESCE(vd.totalamt_sett, vd.totalamt_viatical) AS totalamt_coal FROM sfb_budget b LEFT JOIN sfb_budget_version bv ON bv.sfb_budget_id = b.sfb_budget_id LEFT JOIN sfb_budget_line bl ON bl.sfb_budget_version_id = bv.sfb_budget_version_id LEFT JOIN sfb_budget_cert_line bcl ON bcl.c_costcenter_id = bl.c_costcenter_id AND bcl.sfb_budget_item_id = bl.sfb_budget_item_id AND bcl.user1_id = bl.user1_id LEFT JOIN sfb_budget_cert_line_det_v bcld ON bcld.em_sfb_budget_cert_line_id = bcl.sfb_budget_cert_line_id LEFT JOIN sfb_budget_journaline_det_v bjld ON bjld.sfb_budget_cert_line_id = bcl.sfb_budget_cert_line_id LEFT JOIN sfb_budget_payment_det_v bpd ON bpd.sfb_budget_cert_line_id = bcl.sfb_budget_cert_line_id LEFT JOIN ssve_viatical_details_v vd ON vd.sfb_budget_cert_line_id = bcl.sfb_budget_cert_line_id
